title: Client is randomly freezing -.-
body: Happened 4 times in last 3 days. Client just freezes out of nowhere and becomes totally unresponsive. I can't even close it without using task manager and end process function. Already lost LP cuz of this. I tried to repair client but it didn't solve the problem. Anyone having same problem? How to fix this? its getting annoying -_-

replies.body:
how about repairing your game files, i happen to get the same problem but after some patches from riot it no longer appears.
OR
you can uninstall the game and download the game brand new.

> [{quoted}](name=Angel Phoenix,realm=EUW,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=TF1TEYn9,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-09-17T16:07:42.809+0000)
>
> how about repairing your game files, i happen to get the same problem but after some patches from riot it no longer appears.
> OR
> you can uninstall the game and download the game brand new.

I tried to repair client yesterday but it still happened today (luckily I wasn't in champ select).

I don't really want to uninstall and install game again because my internet is pretty slow.

Have you recently updated Windows 10?  Some players have experienced this freezing issue, and the culprit appears to be an issue with the Xbox game bar not working properly with league.  As a first step, disable the [Xbox Game Bar ](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) for the fix.  Let me know if that helps!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=TF1TEYn9,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-09-17T16:36:43.956+0000)
>
> Have you recently updated Windows 10?  Some players have experienced this freezing issue, and the culprit appears to be an issue with the Xbox game bar not working properly with league.  As a first step, disable the [Xbox Game Bar ](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) for the fix.  Let me know if that helps!

Uhh .. I am using win 7..

Thanks for the heads up!  There may be other issues causing the freezing then, like outdated drivers or something else.  I recommend going over each step of our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to rule out possibilities and resolve this.  Hopefully this will fix things up.
